title: How China Is Helping to Reduce Inflation.

media:group.media:title: How China Is Helping to Reduce Inflation.
media:group.media:description:
China’s crackdown on property developers and its “Zero Covid" policy are harming its economy and the economies of countries selling raw materials to China. But there is an upside to Xi's actions, these policies are reducing inflationary pressures in the rest of the world.
